turns.response: Hey there! Welcome to my place. What can I get for ya today? We've got some amazing specials on the menu, but if you're looking for something classic, our pizzas are always a hit.

Excellent choice! One pizza coming right up. While that's getting ready, have you considered starting with a fresh salad? Our garden salad is made with the freshest ingredients, picked this morning. It's the perfect way to balance out that delicious pizza.

params.prompt: alight, ill buy the salad too

turns.response: Fantastic! So that's one pizza and one salad for you. Anything else I can get started for you? A drink, perhaps?
